entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:47 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
